sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Computes the sec function for its argument. The general syntax for its use is y = sec(x) where x is an n-dimensional array of numerical type. Integer types are promoted to the double type prior to calculation of the sec function. Output y is of the same size and type as the input x, (unless x is an integer, in which case y is a double type).

sect1.title: Internals
sect1.para: Mathematically, the sec function is defined for all arguments as \[ \sec x \equiv \frac{1}{\cos x}. \]
